Column {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Waiting time between eruptions and the duration of the eruption for the
Old Faithful geyser in Yellowstone National Park, Wyoming, USA.

```{r}
selectInput("ctry", label = "Country: ",
            choices = c("Norway", "Sweden"), selected = "Norway")

```

Column
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Geyser Eruption Duration

```{r}
renderPlot({
  full_weo %>% 
    filter(Country == as.character(input$ctry) & year>2018 & year < 2024) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(y=LUR, x=year, fill=Version)) + geom_bar(position="dodge", stat="identity")
)}
```
